ComicInfo.Summary:
All Talk: Betty receives a client who has been promised to have "a very skillful tongue".
Forced Labor: Betty is forced at knife point to be the first sexual encounter of a teenage boy.
The Reunion: Betty reunites with a friend from her teens.
Bondage Palace, Part 2: Finding no sign of the formula in the apartment of the two Russian agents, The Blonde moves to the next apartment, where she is captured by General Prittwitt's twelve year old son. General Prittwitt awaits the return of her two agents, unaware that they stole everything from Amita Berg but the formula. She is also unaware of the listening device planted on her by Popess Crimilda. Agent K-89 pumps Ethel Lorimar for information, thinking she has the formula.
